<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The above HSBC HK App Exclusive offer of extra +1% p.a. time deposit bonus interest rate is valid until 31 March 2025. <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/campaigns/fx-time-deposit/terms-and-condition.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Terms and conditions apply</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Terms and conditions apply  This link will open in a new window</span></a>.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Remarks</p>
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL">
 <li><a id="1"></a>Prevailing time deposit rates refers to rates offered at other channels including Branch and Phonebanking, which have no bonus rates. The deposit amount of the offer should be no less than HKD10,000, RMB10,000, or 2,000 units in other currencies. Each eligible customer can enjoy the offer more than once. Exchange transactions involving notes exchanges, cash deposits, notes withdrawal, inward/outward remittance, HSBC Global Transfers, FX Order Watch, Mastercard® Debit Card, and Deposit Plus, are not counted as eligible currency exchange transactions and do not qualify for the offers under this promotion. The Offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other currency exchange offers or time deposit interest rate offers.<br></li>
 <li><a id="2"></a>This offer is only available during Monday to Friday, 08:00 to 19:00 HKT (excluding public holidays in Hong Kong SAR or time deposit currency regions, or when a black rainstorm warning or typhoon signal No. 8 or above is in force in Hong Kong SAR).</li>
 <li><a id="3"></a>If you are outside of Hong Kong, we may not be authorised to offer or provide you with the products and services available through this website in the country or region you are located or resident in.</li>
</ol>
